name: numeno/api-art-rec
description: ### Introduction  Use the Numeno Article Recommender API to get personalized article recommendations in three easy steps:  1. Define a Persona: Simply provide a description of your interests, vibe, and target audience.  2. Associate the Persona with a Feed.  3. Pull from the Feed to receive a curated selection of articles from across the web.  ### Cross-Origin Resource Sharing This API features Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) implemented in compliance with  [W3C spec](https://www.w3.org/TR/cors/), allowing cross-domain communication from the browser. All responses have a wildcard same-origin policy which makes them accessible from any code on any site.
